title: Hammam Linen White Bath Towels 4-Pack - 27x54 Soft and Absorbent, Premium Quality Perfect for Daily Use 100% Cotton Towel 600 GSM
descriptions:
Hammam Linen White Bath Towels 4-Pack – 100% Cotton, 600 GSM, 27x54 inches

Upgrade your everyday with spa-worthy softness. These premium white bath towels from Hammam Linen deliver plush comfort, fast absorbency, and durable construction—perfect for home or hospitality.

Key features:
- Premium fabric: 100% cotton loops for a soft, naturally breathable feel against skin.
- Thick and absorbent: 600 GSM weight balances luxurious plushness with high absorbency.
- Generous size: 27 x 54 inches for full, comfortable coverage.
- Quick-dry and lightweight: Dries faster to help reduce energy use and stay fresh between washes.
- Built to last: Double-stitched edges enhance durability wash after wash.
- Hotel-quality finish: Clean white, crisp look ideal for bathrooms, guest suites, and registries.
- Eco-conscious choice: Thoughtfully made to support efficient laundering.

What’s included:
- 4 white bath towels (27 x 54 inches, 600 GSM)

Perfect for:
- Home bathrooms and guest rooms
- Hotels and B&Bs
- Poolside and beach days
- Spa, salon, and gym use
- College dorm essentials
- Wedding and housewarming registries

Care instructions:
- Machine washable; tumble dry on low. Towels are dryer-friendly and designed for efficient drying.
- Lint may be noticeable on first washes and diminishes over time; clean the dryer lint trap regularly.
- Avoid contact with skincare products (e.g., benzoyl peroxide, retinol) to prevent discoloration.
- Follow label instructions for best results.

Why you’ll love them:
These towels combine the soft hand-feel you want with the performance you need: thick yet quick-drying, plush yet lightweight, and reinforced to stay beautiful through repeated laundering. Refresh your linen closet with a clean, classic set that’s as practical as it is luxurious.
